metadata.title: CVE-2019-14203 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Das U-Boot through 2019.07. There is astack-based buffer overflow in this nfs_handler reply helper function:nfs_mount_reply.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14203` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

u-boot-amlogic - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-asahi - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-exynos - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-imx - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-microchip - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-mvebu - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-omap - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-qcom - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-qemu - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-rockchip - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-rpi - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-sifive - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-starfive - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-stm32 - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-sunxi - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-tegra - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
u-boot-tools - 2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: u-boot package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
